column4:
['Mujhko mohabbat ho gayi hai', '
Bas mujhko mohabbat ho gayi hai', '
Le thanda pile maide ki garmi hai', '
Dil pe chad gayi hai re', '
Are kuch nahi hai bhadke', '
Tere dil ki dhadkan', '
Badh gayi hai re', 'Ab kya hoga re ab kya hoga', '
Are dil ke jal jane se', '
Koi sar ki nas bhi jal gayi hai re', '
Dil jalta hai to de jalne de', '
Ab hamko mohabbat ho gayi hai', '
Ab hamko mohabbat ho gayi hai', '
Are hosh me aa hosh me aa', 'Ghar walo ko malum hua', '
To ek musibat hogi', '
Or uspe waha wo nur jan gayi to', '
Khair nahi tab or kyamat hogi', '
Wo chal kayamat ki chalkar', '
Jab aankh ke samne aate hai', '
To hath keleje par uthakr', '
Ek dil ko thamne hath hai', '
Jab aankh ke samne aate hai', '
Jinki wo chal kayamat hai', '
Har bat me ek najakat hai', '
Or aap ke hal pe lanat hai', '
Har bat pe ek hamakat hai', 'Is yar ka yaro kya hoga', '
Nadan ka yaro kya hoga', '
Are nadan pagle tu', '
Kya karne laga hai tu', '
Jara se dil ki khatir', '
Khamkha marne laga hai tu', '
Ye dil sabko banata hai', '
Tujhe bhi varg layega', '
Hame bahar bikalega', '
Tujhe andar karayega', 'Mai uske dar pe sar rakhkar', '
Ghar ke bahar mar jaunga', '
Mai uske dar pe sar rakhkar', '
Ghar ke bahar mar jaunga', '
Ke mujhko mohabbat ho gayi hai', '
Ke mujhko mohabbat ho gayi hai', '
Shekhar bhaiya yu nahi karte', '
Itni unchi aah nahi bharte', '
Shekhar bhaiya yu nahi karte', '
Jhuth muth ki shadi karlo', '
Sachi sach iishk nahi karte', '
Shekhar bhaiya yu nahi karte', '
Marna ho to ispe marlo', '
Or kisi pe yu nahi marte', 'Mai us par pura marta hu', '
Wo kuch kuch mujh par marti hai', '
Mai usko sahi samjhta hu', '
Wo mujhko galat samjhti hai', '
Ye halat kaisi ho gayi hai', '
Aisi ki taisi ho gayi', '
Sekhar ko mohabbat ho gayi', '
Hamko musibat ho gayi', '
Sekhar ko mohabbat ho gayi', '
Anhoni bat thi ho gayi hai.']
